reviewText: Informative movie for novice gamblers going to Vegas.

Excellent material. From a long time pro. You actually could "profit" from what Jimmy says. Love his down to earth presentation and humor. I trust him. Great explanation of the games also.

Thank you Jimmy.

Peace, Love, Unity, Oneness.

Jimmy the Scot does an excellent job of explaining how to play each game, and explaining various strategies and money management techniques. He makes EVERY game seem very unique and exciting in their own ways. He makes me want to try every game there is to play. He certainly doesn't discriminate. I'd highly recommend this film, and encourage you to get ready to embrace the exciting world of gambling with this fun, entertaining teacher. I'm a Jimmy the Scot fan!
